right.value:
**Package:** _ballerina/http_  
  
Extracts `xml` payload from the request. If the content type is not XML, an `error` is returned.
  
  
---    
**Parameters**

**Package:** _ballerina/http_  
  
Checks whether the client expects a `100-continue` response.
  
  
---    
**Parameters**

**Package:** _ballerina/http_  
  
Sets a `ByteChannel` as the payload.
  
  
---    
**Parameters**  
- _payload_  
    A `ByteChannel` through which the message payload can be read  
  
- _contentType_  
    The content type of the payload. Set this to override the default `content-type`
                header value  
Default Value: application/octet-stream

**Package:** _ballerina/http_  
  
Gets the request payload as a `byte[]`.
  
  
---    
**Parameters**

**Package:** _ballerina/http_  
  
Extracts `json` payload from the request. If the content type is not JSON, an `error` is returned.
  
  
---    
**Parameters**

**Package:** _ballerina/http_  
  
null  
  
---    
**Parameters**

**Package:** _ballerina/http_  
  
Create a new `Entity` and link it with the request.
  
  
---    
**Parameters**

**Package:** _ballerina/http_  
  
Extracts `text` payload from the request. If the content type is not of type text, an `error` is returned.
  
  
---    
**Parameters**

**Package:** _ballerina/http_  
  
null  
  
---    
**Parameters**

**Package:** _ballerina/http_  
  
Returns the value of the specified header. If the specified header key maps to multiple values, the first of
these values is returned.
  
  
---    
**Parameters**  
- _headerName_  
    The header name

**Package:** _ballerina/http_  
  
Sets the provided `Entity` to the request.
  
  
---    
**Parameters**  
- _e_  
    The `Entity` to be set to the request

**Package:** _ballerina/http_  
  
Sets the specified header to the request. If a mapping already exists for the specified header key, the existing
header value is replaced with the specfied header value.
  
  
---    
**Parameters**  
- _headerName_  
    The header name  
  
- _headerValue_  
    The header value

**Package:** _ballerina/http_  
  
Gets the request payload as a `ByteChannel` except in the case of multiparts. To retrieve multiparts, use
`getBodyParts()`.
  
  
---    
**Parameters**

**Package:** _ballerina/http_  
  
Sets a `string` as the payload.
  
  
---    
**Parameters**  
- _payload_  
    The `string` payload  
  
- _contentType_  
    The content type of the payload. Set this to override the default `content-type` header value
                for `string`  
Default Value: text/plain

**Package:** _ballerina/http_  
  
Sets the `content-type` header to the request.
  
  
---    
**Parameters**  
- _contentType_  
    Content type value to be set as the `content-type` header

**Package:** _ballerina/http_  
  
Sets the request payload.
  
  
---    
**Parameters**  
- _payload_  
    Payload can be of type `string`, `xml`, `json`, `byte[]`, `ByteChannel` or `Entity[]` (i.e: a set
            of body parts)

**Package:** _ballerina/http_  
  
null  
  
---    
**Parameters**

**Package:** _ballerina/http_  
  
Sets the content of the specified file as the entity body of the request.
  
  
---    
**Parameters**  
- _filePath_  
    Path to the file to be set as the payload  
  
- _contentType_  
    The content type of the specified file. Set this to override the default `content-type`
                header value  
Default Value: application/octet-stream

**Package:** _ballerina/http_  
  
Removes all the headers from the request.  
  
---    
**Parameters**

**Package:** _ballerina/http_  
  
Adds the specified header to the request. Existing header values are not replaced.
  
  
---    
**Parameters**  
- _headerName_  
    The header name  
  
- _headerValue_  
    The header value

**Package:** _ballerina/http_  
  
Set multiparts as the payload.
  
  
---    
**Parameters**  
- _bodyParts_  
    The entities which make up the message body  
  
- _contentType_  
    The content type of the top level message. Set this to override the default
                `content-type` header value  
Default Value: multipart/form-data

**Package:** _ballerina/http_  
  
Gets the `Entity` associated with the request.
  
  
---    
**Parameters**

**Package:** _ballerina/http_  
  
Checks whether the requested header key exists in the header map.
  
  
---    
**Parameters**  
- _headerName_  
    The header name

**Package:** _ballerina/http_  
  
Sets an `xml` as the payload.
  
  
---    
**Parameters**  
- _payload_  
    The `xml` payload  
  
- _contentType_  
    The content type of the payload. Set this to override the default `content-type` header value
                for `xml`  
Default Value: application/xml

**Package:** _ballerina/http_  
  
Sets a `json` as the payload.
  
  
---    
**Parameters**  
- _payload_  
    The `json` payload  
  
- _contentType_  
    The content type of the payload. Set this to override the default `content-type` header value
                for `json`  
Default Value: application/json

**Package:** _ballerina/http_  
  
Removes the specified header from the request.
  
  
---    
**Parameters**  
- _key_  
    The header name

**Package:** _ballerina/http_  
  
Check whether the entity body is present.
  
  
---    
**Parameters**

**Package:** _ballerina/http_  
  
Gets the query parameters of the request, as a map.
  
  
---    
**Parameters**

**Package:** _ballerina/http_  
  
Gets all the names of the headers of the request.
  
  
---    
**Parameters**

**Package:** _ballerina/http_  
  
Gets the matrix parameters of the request.
  
  
---    
**Parameters**  
- _path_  
    Path to the location of matrix parameters

**Package:** _ballerina/http_  
  
Extracts body parts from the request. If the content type is not a composite media type, an error
is returned.  
  
---    
**Parameters**

**Package:** _ballerina/http_  
  
Gets the type of the payload of the request (i.e: the `content-type` header value).
  
  
---    
**Parameters**

**Package:** _ballerina/http_  
  
Gets the form parameters from the HTTP request as a `map` when content type is application/x-www-form-urlencoded.
  
  
---    
**Parameters**

**Package:** _ballerina/http_  
  
Sets a `byte[]` as the payload.
  
  
---    
**Parameters**  
- _payload_  
    The `byte[]` payload  
  
- _contentType_  
    The content type of the payload. Set this to override the default `content-type` header value
                for `byte[]`  
Default Value: application/octet-stream

**Package:** _ballerina/http_  
  
Gets all the header values to which the specified header key maps to.
  
  
---    
**Parameters**  
- _headerName_  
    The header name
